name: Contrast in Spirit
description:
Legends say, if a being is exposed to too much pressure,  their spirit might split in two. A positive spirit and a negative spirit. Work together to complete your spirit again, as both needs to exist to  keep the inner balance. Controls (Keyboard)

Movement: W, A, S, D

Interact: E

Swap Character: Z

Jump: Spacebar

Controls (XBOX Controller / PS4 Controller)

Movement: Left stick

Interact: Gamepad Y / Gamepad Triangle

Jump: Gamepad A / Gamepad Cross
